With U-turns frequent in Governmant Policy and also poor Policies concidered in Goverment - there needs to be a way of the people and NOT the MP's deciding what is best for us the people. with www. available can WE all use the e-petitions as a way of voting on decisions and NOT have MP's making their voting decisions based on what the WIPS' want implemented . This way of voting would (if secure) engage with the public be much cheaper that having MP's and costly voting days.

This way of voting could be used to knit whole groups of decision together and so give a better understanding of what the public WANT and not governments own interpetation - which usually is way of the mark.

The BBC did a web page last year asking what departments spend could be so as to balance the books - nice if implemented too.
